## DataSource.connect() method

This method is called when the `DataSource` is added to a \[\[MapView\]\]. Reimplement this method to provide any custom initialization, such as, to establish a network connection, or to initialize complex data structures.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
connect(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
